verses.verse: Then they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H362>Elim,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H9358>Sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H362>Elim<s%> and <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after their <S%H3318>departure<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4310>"Would<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that we had <S%H4191>died<s%> by the Lord's <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when we <S%H3427>sat<s%> by the <S%H5518>pots<s%> of <S%H1320>meat,<s%> when we <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full;<s%> for you have <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out into <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for you; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H3950>gather<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1697>portion<s%> every day, that I may <S%H5254>test<s%> them, whether <S%H518>or<s%> not they will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H8451>instruction.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> when they <S%H3559>prepare<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> they <S%H935>bring<s%> in, it will be <S%H4932>twice<s%> as <S%H834>much<s%> as they <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H3117>daily.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "At <S%H6153>evening<s%> you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%>

and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> are we, that you <S%H9235>grumble<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us? "

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "[This will happen] when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you <S%H1320>meat<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7646>full<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H9235>grumble<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> Him. And <S%H4100>what<s%> are we? Your <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> are not <S%H5921>against<s%> us but <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7126>'Come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8519>grumblings.<s%>'"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>grumblings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'At <S%H6153>twilight<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>bread;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>'"

So it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at <S%H6153>evening<s%> that the <S%H7958>quails<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> there was a <S%H7902>layer<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

When the <S%H7902>layer<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5927>evaporated,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> there was a <S%H1851>fine<s%> flake-like <S%H2636>thing,<s%> <S%H1851>fine<s%> as the <S%H9214>frost<s%> on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

When the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [it,] they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H9271>"What<s%> is it?" For they did not <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> it was. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "It is the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you to <S%H402>eat.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H3950>'Gather<s%> of it <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> as <S%H6310>much<s%> as he should <S%H398>eat;<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> an <S%H9418>omer<s%> <S%H1538>apiece<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H5315>persons<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H3947>has<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%>'"
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and [some] <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> and [some] <S%H4591>little.<s%>

When they <S%H4058>measured<s%> it with an <S%H9418>omer,<s%> he who <S%H7235>had<s%> gathered <S%H7235>much<s%> had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5736>excess,<s%> and he who <S%H4591>had<s%> gathered <S%H4591>little<s%> had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2637>lack;<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3950>gathered<s%> as <S%H6310>much<s%> as he should <S%H398>eat.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>"

But they did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H376>some<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> part of it <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and it <S%H9560>bred<s%> <S%H8438>worms<s%> and <S%H887>became<s%> <S%H887>foul;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with them.

And they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> as <S%H6310>much<s%> as he should <S%H398>eat;<s%> but when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2552>grew<s%> <S%H2552>hot,<s%> it would <S%H4549>melt.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as <S%H4932>much<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H9418>omers<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%> When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

then he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1931>"This<s%> is <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>meant:<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> is a <S%H7677>sabbath<s%> <S%H7677>observance,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H644>Bake<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you will <S%H644>bake<s%> and <S%H1310>boil<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you will <S%H1310>boil,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H5736>left<s%> <S%H5736>over<s%> <S%H5117>put<s%> <S%H5117>aside<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>"

So they <S%H5117>put<s%> it <S%H5117>aside<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H6680>ordered,<s%> and it did not <S%H887>become<s%> <S%H887>foul,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> was there any <S%H7415>worm<s%> in it.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H398>"Eat<s%> it <S%H3117>today,<s%> for <S%H3117>today<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> you will not <S%H4672>find<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H3950>gather<s%> it, but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> [the] <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> there will be <S%H3808>none.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H3950>gather,<s%> but they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> do you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and My <S%H8451>instructions<s%>?

<S%H7200>"See,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H7676>sabbath;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> He <S%H5414>gives<s%> you <S%H3899>bread<s%> for two <S%H3117>days<s%> on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H3427>Remain<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H8478>place;<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H4478>manna,<s%> and it was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> and its <S%H2940>taste<s%> was like <S%H6838>wafers<s%> with <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> 'Let an <S%H4393>omerful<s%> <S%H9418><s%> of it be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> that I <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> when I <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> a <S%H6803>jar<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H4393>omerful<s%> <S%H9418><s%> of <S%H4478>manna<s%> in it, and <S%H5117>place<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>"
As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5117>placed<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to an <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> they <S%H398>ate<s%> the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>border<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
(Now an <S%H9418>omer<s%> is a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>)
